subject: Mandatory use of Unique Project Code (UPC) in all official matter in NHAI -reg.
text: HR-y <fy ~TTTf gferarot Tri9 Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Tsv 9Rde7 &r TroTHrf +iT4) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) #1-5 & 6, R27-10, ERGT; 7f fccm} 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ IT/2022 Circular No; 6.29/2022 dated 19th April, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/IT/2021/A-App/ AE-IE/ Consultant (Comp.No. 88777)} Sub: Mandatory use of Unique Project Code (UPC) in all official matter in NHAI -reg: To bring financial discipline; Unique Project Code (UPC) is issued to each project: To further improve the system, it has been decided that in all the official communication within the NHAI or with outside agencies shall bear the UPC. No file correspondence without UPC shall be initiated processed henceforth. It will be the responsibility of the officer, who is initiating the file correspondence to ensure compliance to the above. 2 . This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Ou (Lt Col Chandan Vatsa, Retd) To: Chief General Manager (Coord.) All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site 3 Web Admin for circulation: M U &H NHAL Policy Copy
